About the Company: PG Foils Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of aluminium foils, foil laminates and flexible ,which has various uses in the packaging industry.The product range of the company includes Aseptic Packaging for Milk, Fruit juice, Cooking Oil,Cigarettes foil Tobacco, Cigarettes and mouth fresheners,Decoration foil,Label foil,Closure Caps/ PP Caps for glass or plastic bottles, resale boxes etc, Food Packaging,Soup, pouches, flow wrap for biscuit, coffee wrap etc,Lids for yogurt, confectioners,Bottle neck decoration,Pharma foil,Tea,House Hold foil and kitchen foil,Insulation,Semi rigid container/ Casserole/ Tagger,Cable Wrap for Telecommunication,Bakery & confectionery Wraps,Contraceptive Wrap,Toiletry and cosmetic products and Lamitube for collapsible tubes for toothpaste, skin care, ointments etc.
